microphone.description: Microphone model or type used in this protocol.

acquisition_hardware.description: Hardware used for audio acquisition in this protocol.

acquisition_software.description: Software used to record audio in this protocol.

channels.description: number of microphones used for recording

sound isolation.description: presence of a sound attenuating chamber

animals.description: Details about the animal(s) involved in the recording session.

name.description: Common or given name used to refer to the animal(s) during the study.

identifier.description: Unique identifier assigned to the animal(s), used for tracking and referencing within the experiment.

cohort.description: Group or batch to which the animal(s) belongs.

origin.description: Source from which the animal(s) were obtained.

animal_type.description: Detailed information about the biological characteristics of the animal(s).

strain.description: Strain designation of the animal(s), e.g., C57BL/6J.

genotype.description: Genotype or genetic modification status of the animal(s), e.g., WT, KO.

treatment.description: Experimental treatment applied to the animal(s), such as drug exposure or behavioral protocol.

context.description: experimental context used for the recording session

brightness.description: brightness of the recording environment in Lux

datetime.description: Date when the recording was made (YYY-MM-DD hh:mm:ss).

duration.description: duration of the recording in seconds

laboratory.description: Name or identifier of the laboratory where the recording was performed.
